Title: Advanced File System Explorer
Description: C# application which allows users to look at the on disk structures used by file systems. In the first instance this will be NTFS.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
C# application which allows users to look at the on disk structures used by file systems. In the first instance this will be NTFS.

File System Explorer is a research project designed to allow the user to examine on disk structures for common file systems.

I'm starting with NTFS to (hopefully) prove the usefulness of the tool.

Why am I doing this? Well, I've become interested in Computer Forensics and I've always loved working out how things work. I also want to learn about creating WPF applications. So, I'm bringing it all together here.


Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
